author: wn.com
title: Inaugural Diversity Conference – “Equity in Action” (Broward County Public Schools)
text: ( Source : Broward County Public Schools ) Creating a better understanding of similarities and differences among cultures, ethnicities and races will be the focus of the inaugural Diversity Conference presented by Broward County Public Schools
